title: Monster Sandwich with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
ingredients: Ketchup, Mustard, Mayonnaise, or other sauce of choice
instructions: Step 1: Take a sandwich and spread mayonnaise, mustard, and ketchup (or other sauce of choice) on it.
Step 2: Rinse the lettuce in a bowl with salt and let it sit for 5 minutes. Then, tear the lettuce into small pieces.
Step 3: Place a small piece of lettuce on the bread. Then, add a couple of sliced tomatoes.
Step 4: Add ham and cheese. And place Exciting Nacho Ranch Chips on top.
Step 5: Repeat the same process to create a Monster Sandwich.
